segments.text: Hello . I have a room booked for tonight , the 15th .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright and what is your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , yes , here you are Ms . Gleason . You reserved a single , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you mind being next to the elevator ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I ’ d prefer not to be .
segments.speaker: S1
